lead_paragraph: A coroner ruled that the former Bills lineman Mitch Frerotte died of hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, a thickening of the heart muscle. Armstrong County Coroner Robert Bower said Frerotte was 43 when he collapsed at home in Kittanning, Pa., on Wednesday.
